title: Government to soon float tenders for 10 GW of battery energy storage projects: Official
description: India is set to invite bids for 10 gigawatts of battery energy storage projects, aiming to boost indigenous manufacturing and reduce EV import reliance. The Ministry of Heavy Industries' RFP targets grid-scale systems, supporting the ACC-PLI scheme's 50 gigawatt-hour goal and broader industry growth.
